department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: three panels sewn together; white; sides stitched under arm openings; four star-shaped medallions--one on each shoulder and chest and back--with black velvet centers and black and red stitching; black stars stitched around medallions; black, pink, salmon, lavender and purple decorative stitching; black and red stitching and black velvet around neckline and arm openings
title: Huipil
